advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
releaseNotes: Choose between List or Grid view for your Profile’s channel.
description:
Sing over 10 million of your favourite songs with music & scrolling lyrics! Have fun recording with your camera on or off and add professional audio effects to sound amazing! Sing karaoke solo, duet with friends, join members of Smule’s collaborative singing community, or sing alongside recordings of popular music celebrities.

With millions of songs to choose from, you’re sure to find all of your favourites, including the latest trending music! Smule is fun for everyone who likes to sing - all skill levels welcome! 

FEATURES
• Find 10+ million of your favourite karaoke songs w/ scrolling lyrics! 
• Sing karaoke solo, in a duet or group, acapella, or enjoy another singer’s performance
• Record studio-quality audio with music voice effects to help you sound amazing
• Host or join a live karaoke party! Sing LIVE w/ audio 24/7 with friends & music lovers around the world
• Sing & record with your camera off for audio-only performances or turn it on & get creative with fun video effects & filters
• Sing tunes side-by-side in a recorded duet with artists like Dua Lipa, Olivia Rodrigo, Charlie Puth, Ed Sheeran, Disney characters, & more
• Your Smule profile lets you save your recordings as private as you practice & learn to sing, or post and share with the Smule community
• Share your music performances to TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, Twitter, WhatsApp & more
• Make a music video! Record audio & vocals first & then add your own video
• Freestyle lets you record an original song & invite others to join you
• Join new Smule challenges & contests every month to win prizes & get noticed
• Send personalised musical messages for family & friends!
• Learn to sing with an on-screen pitch guide & Smule tutorials
• Join a duet  & sing just your favourite part of the song, like the chorus or verse, with ‘Moments’
• Smule lets you record yourself voice acting scenes from movies, musicals & more

LET'S MUSIC TOGETHER™

With new songs added daily, you’ll find your favourite songs & karaoke hits. Can’t find a song? Upload songs & trending music to the Songbook: https://www.smule.com/support/upload#songbook

CONNECTING THE WORLD THROUGH MUSIC™

We believe music is about more than just listening—it's about creating, sharing, discovering, participating, & connecting. It’s the original social network with the power to break down barriers & bring people together. Join our global community & sing songs that express who you are.

Band together & collaborate with other singers around the world. Get discovered & gain fans! Create & record your own choreography while you sing. Integrate your singing journey with your social media.

FIND YOUR VOICE

Everyone can sound great on Smule. Use music voice effects & video filters to smooth over imperfections.

If you love karaoke, like to sing along to radio songs, dream of singing a duet with pop stars, or simply love music—try Smule free now!

SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS
- Subscribe for unlimited access to our full karaoke song catalog and sing karaoke solos, duets, group songs and a cappella for the duration of your subscription
- Subscriptions are weekly, monthly and annual*
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period
- Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription
- You can read our privacy policy at www.smule.com/privacy
*Price are equal to the value that "Apple's App Store Matrix" determines is the equivalent of the subscription price in $USD
 
https://www.smule.com/termsofservice
